metadata.description:
Mono undertakes a deadly mission at the behest of Britain's American allies...but what secrets will he find deep in the heart of the Pacific...?

Best-selling writer Brian Wood (Star Wars, DMZ) teams with acclaimed artist Sergio Sandoval (Batman, Uncharted) to tell a white-knuckled two-part tale that takes Mono across the world for a hair-raising adventure!
metadata.name: Mono: Pacific
